text: the mirin important part or my
traditional public you
my name is poor and part and I am a
traditional puppeteer a puppeteer Monday
Kelly are commissioned to fully master
the art of puppetry one has to be a
singer dancer writer actor and sculptor
all-in-one when asked to know painting
tailoring and even designed jewelry for
the puppet yeah but philosophically I
have lived in capitally colony in Delhi
for last 50 years many artists live here
they are puppeteers magicians jugglers
and storytellers our ancestors were
travelling artists they found work and
settled here this island of creativity
is important as it's rare to find all
this in one place this place is magical
our children become practicing artists
from a very young age they are free to
learn anything they want most choose to
work here but it is sad that some leave
us as life is difficult there is no
money to be made in puppetry
puppetry leaves our audience spellbound
they are wide-eyed in amazement but when
the show is over
they forget us we perform for foreign
diplomats and visitors we represent
India's culture but when it comes to our
welfare the authorities ignore us now we
are being asked to leave our homes to
make way for a shopping mall we have
lost so much with the changing times we
can't afford to lose this too instead of
moving us the government should make a
colony into a tourist destination for
people to come and experience our world
if our homes are shifted it will kill
our way of life
you
